about_the_game:
The content will be downloaded to the folder called 'Kontrakt OST'.

Format: MP3 320kbps

Kontrakt - 5 - Terminal Case (Length 03:46)

Kontrakt - 7 - Blood Rush (Length 03:31)
Kontrakt - 8 - Revival (Length 04:07)
Kontrakt - 9 - F.I.N.C. (Length 03:22)
Kontrakt - 10 - So What Do We Do (Length 03:36)

Kontrakt - 13 - Borderman (Length 02:45)
Kontrakt - 14 - Menu (Length 00:29)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS 2.0 / Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent (1 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

name: Kontrakt OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent (1 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Kontrakt OST is a collection of 14 diverse, dark-electronic tracks.
